sentences.english: Some coastal cities are building desalination plants to turn seawater into drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 一些海滨城市正建造海水淡化处理厂，以解燃眉之急。

sentences.english: Some companies will give you a salary advance for personal emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 一些公司给你提前支薪以解个人燃眉之急。
